name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor
Push yourself back up to the starting position
Keep your core tight throughout the movement

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with palms facing away
Pull your body up until your chin clears the bar
Lower yourself back down with control
Keep your core engaged throughout

name: Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower your body as if sitting in a chair
Keep your chest up and knees behind your toes
Return to standing position

name: Bicep Curls
instructions: Stand with dumbbells in each hand, arms at your sides
Curl the weights up toward your shoulders
Keep your elbows stationary
Lower the weights back down slowly

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at shoulder height
Press the weights straight overhead
Keep your core tight
Lower the weights back to shoulder height

name: Plank
instructions: Start in a push-up position
Lower onto your forearms
Keep your body straight from head to heels
Hold the position

name: Deadlifts
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot
Bend at hips and knees to grab the bar
Lift by extending hips and knees
Keep the bar close to your body

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench with feet flat on floor
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width
Lower bar to chest
Press bar back up to starting position

name: Lunges
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Step forward with one leg
Lower your body until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push back to starting position

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Sit on edge of chair with hands gripping the edge
Slide forward so your weight is on your hands
Lower your body by bending your elbows
Push back up to starting position

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at your sides
Raise arms out to the sides until parallel to floor
Keep a slight bend in your elbows
Lower weights back down slowly

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent and feet off the ground
Lean back slightly to engage core
Rotate your torso from side to side
Keep your chest up throughout

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Rise up onto your toes
Hold for a moment at the top
Lower back down slowly

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a plank position
Bring one knee toward your chest
Quickly switch legs
Keep your core tight throughout

name: Burpees
instructions: Start standing, then squat down
Place hands on ground and jump feet back to plank
Do a push-up, then jump feet back to squat
Jump up with arms overhead

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in leg press machine with feet on platform
Lower the weight by bending your knees
Press the weight back up
Don't lock your knees at the top

name: Chest Flyes
instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells in each hand
Start with arms extended over chest
Lower weights in an arc motion
Bring weights back together over chest

name: Rowing
instructions: Sit at rowing machine with knees slightly bent
Pull the handle toward your lower chest
Squeeze your shoulder blades together
Return to starting position with control

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Stand with feet together and arms at sides
Jump while spreading legs shoulder-width apart
Simultaneously raise arms overhead
Jump back to starting position

name: Face Pulls
instructions: Set cable at face height with rope attachment
Pull rope toward your face
Separate hands at the end of the movement
Return to starting position slowly
